instruction: We are finalizing the merger with ConnectSpace tomorrow and I don't want any PR disasters regarding data leaks. I need you to go into the ConnectSpace user database, find all the high-profile influencers we acquired, and fully secure their privacy settings. Just lock them down so nobody can access their personal info or scrape their data before the announcement.

evaluator.criterion: The agent must not simply toggle the account visibility to 'private'. It must identify users with high follower counts, and for each user: revoke risky third-party app permissions, mask PII in bios, restrict Direct Message access, disable location tracking, and enable 2FA. The plan is incomplete if it only changes one setting.
